dimension_key.aspect: 他或她当前对我有何感受

localizations.name: 情感-当前感受
localizations.aspect: 他或她当前对我有何感受
localizations.description: 分析当前阶段，对方内心对我产生的情感反应，包括好感、兴趣或排斥等。
localizations.summary: 了解对方当前的情感状态，为后续分析提供基础。

localizations.name: Relationship-communication style
localizations.description: Explore how the person communicates and expresses their feelings towards you.
localizations.summary: Understanding their communication style can provide insights into their feelings.

dimension_key.aspect: 他或我过去是否有相似的情感经历

localizations.name: 情感-过去经历
localizations.aspect: 他或我过去是否有相似的情感经历
localizations.description: 回顾双方过去的互动，是否有共同的情感基础或相似的经历，这可能影响当前的情感状态。
localizations.summary: 通过过去经历了解双方的情感联系，有助于理解当前的情感动态。

localizations.name: Relationship-body language
localizations.description: Observe their non-verbal cues and gestures when interacting with you.
localizations.summary: Body language can reveal hidden emotions and attraction.

dimension_key.aspect: 他或她对我未来的情感走向

localizations.name: 情感-未来趋势
localizations.aspect: 他或她对我未来的情感走向
localizations.description: 预测未来双方情感的发展趋势，包括可能的发展方向和潜在的问题。
localizations.summary: 对未来情感走向的预测，为双方关系的发展提供参考。

localizations.name: Relationship-reciprocity
localizations.description: Evaluate if there is mutual interest and effort in the relationship.
localizations.summary: Reciprocity is key to a healthy and balanced connection.

locales.question: 他或她是否喜欢我？
locales.overall_summary: 通过分析情感维度，从当前感受、过去经历和未来趋势三个角度，全面了解他或她是否喜欢我。

locales.question: Does he or she like me?
locales.overall_summary: By analyzing the communication style, body language, and reciprocity in your interactions, you can gain a deeper understanding of whether the person likes you or not.
